description:
After the theft of the http://anidb.net/ch1489 [Freedom Gundam], former http://anidb.net/ch1554 [PLANT Supreme Council] chairman Siegel Clyne is branded a traitor. Clyne and his followers become fugitives, waging an underground campaign of resistance to the radical leadership of Patrick Zala. The Clyne Faction carries on the fight even after Siegel himself is gunned down, working within the http://anidb.net/ch1571 [PLANTs] to thwart Patrick Zala`s plans.
http://anidb.net/ch302 [Lacus Clyne] takes over the command of Clyne Faction after the death of her father.
name: Clyne Faction
